about_the_game:
You can change the art drawings of the famous officers, such as DiaoChan, Sun Shangxiang, and Peimi Hoo in "Kingdom Heroes 8".

Notice:
1. This DLC can only be used in the game library containing "Kingdom Heroes 8".
2. You must buy the DLC "The Hibiscus storm clouds" to change the art drawings of Peimi Hoo.
